omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with plans as (
  select
    distinct
    b.patientid,
    a.procedurecode,
    a.start_date as event_start_date,
    a.end_date as event_end_date
  from
    omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan a
  left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
  where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
),
attendances as (
  select
    distinct
    b.patientid,
    a.procedurecode,
    a.actualstartdatetime_s as event_start_date,
    a.actualenddatetime_s as event_end_date
  from
    omop_staging.rtds_2a_attendances a
  left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
  where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
)
select * from plans
union all
select * from attendances
order by
  event_start_date;

omopColumns.name: procedure_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `procedure` domain.

omopColumns.name: procedure_date
omopColumns.query:

omopColumns.name: procedure_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR Administration record`

omopColumns.name: procedure_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve OPCS4 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
with plans as (
  select
    distinct
    b.patientid,
    a.procedurecode,
    a.start_date as event_start_date,
    a.end_date as event_end_date
  from
    omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan a
  left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
  where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
),
attendances as (
  select
    distinct
    b.patientid,
    a.procedurecode,
    a.actualstartdatetime_s as event_start_date,
    a.actualenddatetime_s as event_end_date
  from
    omop_staging.rtds_2a_attendances a
  left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
  where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
)
select * from plans
union all
select * from attendances
order by
  event_start_date;
